name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chat no Nakama/チャットの仲間

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translates chat messages between Japanese and English on Twitch. Doesn't interfere with BTTV FFZ or 7TV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Extension to translate japanese to english and english to japanese in twitch chats without interfering with other 3rd party extensions
